detail.title: 419 Anti-CCP Rally
detail.info: On the afternoon of April 19, 2025, at Ketagalan Boulevard in Taipei City, opposing the infiltration and united front of the CCP, safeguarding Taiwan's democracy and freedom.

card.title: "Reject United Front, Safeguard Taiwan" Rally
card.description: The "Reject United Front, Safeguard Taiwan" Rally, also known as the 419 March, is a large-scale rally and march held on the afternoon of April 19, 2025, at Ketagalan Boulevard in Taipei City, Taiwan. The event's appeal is to oppose the infiltration and united front of the Chinese Communist Party and to safeguard Taiwan's democracy and freedom.
